name: Lord of the Sword
description:
Play our challenging 2D RPG platformer.

  • Overcome dangerous dungeons
  • Fight mythological monsters and bosses
  • Gather special materials
  • Bring the undead blacksmith back to life
Are you up to the challenge?Instructions:
  • Arrows to move and jump;
  • Q and the direction you want to dash;
  • W to use a melee spell;
  • Space to attack.

Game developed by:

  • André Borges
  • Goncalo Peres
